entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lillooet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lillooet 10:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 800 metres in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
